bioconda.name: exonerate
bioconda.summary: Exonerate - A generic tool for pairwise sequence comparison / alignment

biocontainers.name: exonerate
biocontainers.summary: A tool for pairwise sequence alignment. it enables alignment for dna-dna and dna-protein pairs and also gapped and ungapped alignment.

biotools.summary: A tool for pairwise sequence alignment. It enables alignment for DNA-DNA and DNA-protein pairs and also gapped and ungapped alignment.

bioschemas.name: Exonerate
bioschemas.summary: A tool for pairwise sequence alignment. It enables alignment for DNA-DNA and DNA-protein pairs and also gapped and ungapped alignment.

galaxy.summary: Exonerate is a generic tool for pairwise sequence comparison.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: A tool for pairwise sequence alignment. It enables alignment for DNA-DNA and DNA-protein pairs and also gapped and ungapped alignment.
